mapper.select: select IF(count(*) = 0, 0 , liketype ) from likecount where likeid = #{likeid} and board = #{board} and seq = #{seq}
select IF(count(*) = 0, 0 , liketype ) from replylikecount where likerid = #{likerid} and board = #{board} and rseq = #{rseq}
mapper.update: update ${board} set likecount = likecount+1 where seq = #{seq}
update ${board} set likecount = likecount-1 where seq = #{seq}
mapper.delete: delete from likecount where likeid = #{likeid} and board = #{board} and seq = #{seq}
delete from replylikecount where likeid = #{likerid} and board = #{board} and seq = #{rseq}
mapper.update: update ${board} set rlikecount = rlikecount+1 where rseq = #{rseq}
update ${board} set rlikecount = rlikecount-1 where rseq = #{rseq}
